idea: Arumano is truly handcrafted Luxury Scented Products. We offer Home Decor and all kind of aromatic lifestyle products such as Candles, Diffusers, Incense, Potpourri & many more.
name: Arumano

idea: Everyone wants to save time in today's scenario be it when you visit a local store or any haircut salon. We all want to be serviced first and donot like to wait in queue. The idea is on the same lines. When we goto salons and beauty parlors, due to overcrowding we have to wait and the time may vary from 15-20 minutes to 30 minutes and sometimes even 45 minutes. This wait time is really painful as some important work is always waiting to be done and the wait time could have been utilised for finishing that work rather than sitting ideally.  My idea pertains to this sector where haircuts for men and few basic services for women is a frequent and basic necessity. I want to bring a system which can do away with the wait time which many of us face frequently.
name: Cherry

name: Shree Ram Food Products

idea: KSKT AgroMart is a technology & Supply Chain Innovation based Farm to fork venture with a specific objective of Providing Consumer a Naturally Grown Food Products which are Harmful chemical free and coming directly from farms. KSKT also Motivates farmers to switch to Natural & Jaivik Farming by providing them Knowledge & training, Crop Planning, Agri Inputs & Market linkages. KSKT also supports doubling the farmers income (DFI), reducing food wastage in supply chain (THINK EAST SAVE) , Helping india eat more balanced nutrition & Natural food ( EAT RIGHT INDIA) and Jaivik Bharat Initiatives
name: KSKT AgroMart Private Limited

idea: JT Mobility Pvt. Ltd is a professional manufacturer and supplier of electric vehicle components, including all kinds of EV plugs and sockets, EV cables, EV connectors, and Portable EV charging cables. All our products come with CE,TUV and UL certification. We sell our products to domestic and overseas , we pay close attention to the development of new energy automotive industry, we determined to become the industry leader and innovator. JT Group constantly strive to adhere to our business philosophy of “quality is the soul, the principle of good faith, Innovation leads the future ”. In order to establish a long-term relationship with all our customers, we will offer a competitive price, high quantity products and a good after-sales-service and we will improve our competitiveness and achieve a win-win situation for us as well as our clients.
name: JT MOBILITY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Unigold Agro Biotech Private Limited was formed in 2018 by a team of dedicated scientists and marketing professionals, highly experienced in the field of Agriculture, Biochemistry, Pharmaceutical and Petro-chemicals. Our company is currently engaged in manufacturing and marketing of Aminol Free L-Amino Acids With 5 Percent Nitrogen, Ultra Organic Soil Conditioner And Fertility Enhancer, BHOOMIGOLD (Slow release organic nutrient) and a host of other products. Our progressive company offers products which have organic certification from APEDA approved certifying agency ECOCERTSA, and are suitable for organic farming. As manufacturer and trader, we are introducing most all organic agro products at most feasible rates to ensure customers satisfaction. The vision of our company is to be recognized as a quality manufacturer and supplier of quality organic products for Agriculture, Aqua-culture, Poultry and Animal Feed. We also wish to provide quality customer service to create value, to meet customers' requirements in time and satisfy their needs.Our mission is to offer value proposition and solutions to Agriculture, Aqua-culture, Poultry and Cattle Farming by developing and launching technologically advanced and ecologically acceptable products. We at Unigold Agro Biotech Private Limited believe in serving finely packed Unisa Unique Surface Active Adjuvant, 5 Star Organic Soil Conditioner And Fertility Enhancer and allied agro products to aid farmers indulge in organic farming. For packaging, different quantities of quality retaining packs are used, which promote quality retention and safe shipment.
name: UNIGOLD AGRO BIOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: A startup to take apparel retailing at Next Generation level post Covid-19 Pandemic
